eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Nevada; AT 03:31 PM ON NOV 26, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:31 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is Washoe County Emergency Management with the Required Monthly Test of the Emergency Alert System. Federal, state and local officials use EAS to keep you informed in the event of an emergency or disaster through your local radio and TV stations and cable providers. This test helps ensure that EAS Participants are ready to provide information in a crisis. This concludes todays test of the Emergency Alert System.
